metadata.name: 'FUTURE DREAMS'
metadata.description:
FUTURE DREAMS collab w/ SuperVillian

The main theme is a collision between 80s and VR. We combined these two.

The people owning the 2 editions of this piece will have to burn to own the second piece.(2ed to burn)

We will give a snapshot date soon. Then, we will airdrop the piece that SuperVillian and i created to the FUTURE DREAMS holders. 

Sketch / Line by SuperVillian  
Colors / Details by Gruff

6250x6250  
49.5 MB
